issue.title: [R] Better error message when creating an array from decimals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18216](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18216). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should first check why this doesn't work, and if we can instead fix the problem instead of the error message

```r

> ChunkedArray$create(c(1.4, 525.5), type = decimal(precision = 1, scale = 3))
Error: NotImplemented: Extend
```
